name: Bx Carousel Ultimate
author: Md Mamunur Roshid

sections.description:
Bx Carousel Ultimate WordPress is a jQuery supper awesome carousel for your wordpress website. This plugin will enable awesome carousel.

You can change carousel Items, Loop, Margin-right, Orderby(ASC & DESC), Rtl (Left Direction & Right Direction), Nav, Dots, DotsEach, Autoplay, AutoplayTimeout, AutoplayHoverPause, SmartSpeed, Desktop Items, Tablet Items, Mobile Items, Extra Mobile, Small mobile & other settings by using the options of this plugin by TyneMCE power of wordpress beside you also can change font color, background color, Hover color & others.

Plugin Demo url: http://bootstrapgrids.com/plugins/carousel-from-custom-post/

Premimum Features

  1. Carousel style
  2. Carousel ID
  3. Carousel Post Type
  4. carousel Category
  5. Orderby
  6. carousel Navigation Background
  7. carousel Navigation Hover
  8. carousel Text Color
  9. Desktop Items
  10. Tablet Items
  11. Mobile Items
  12. Extra Mobile Items
  13. Mobile Items
  14. Loop
  15. Margin
  16. Left & Right Direction
  17. Navigation
  18. Auto Play
  19. Smart Speed
  20. Auto Play Time Out
  21. Auto Play Hover Pause
  22. Dots
  23. Dots Each

Others much more……

Cadecanyon Premimum carousel Buy here

If you need any other assignment then contact with me via odesk profile here
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

e.g.

  1. From your wordpress dashboard, choose ‘Add New’ under the ‘Plugins’ category.
  2. Select ‘upload’ from the set of links at the top of the page (The second links) button
  3. From here, browse for the zip file include in your plugin purchase titled ‘bx-carousel-ultimate-wordpress.zip’ and click the ‘install now’
  4. Once installation is complete, active the plugin to enable it’s features.

After install, the plugin will add a menu custom post called “Bx Carousel Items”. Now “Add New” custom post here.

Configuration TinyMCE Features

  1. Carousel style : Enable four difference style
  2. Carousel ID : Input carousel ID but make sure that it’s different from each others
  3. Carousel Post Type : Enable two post type here
  4. carousel Category : Input carousel category here

Or Basic Usage

Carousel Style One

[bx_carousel_image_only id="different ID" posttype="bx-carousel" category="your Category"]

Carousel Style Two

[bx_carousel_bx id="different ID" posttype="bx-carousel" category="your Category"]

Carousel Style Three

[bx_carousel_content id="different ID" posttype="post" category="your Category"]

Carousel Style Four

[bx_carousel_image_only id="different ID" posttype="post" category="your Category"]
sections.faq:
How can I install this plugin?

You can install as others regular wordpress plugin. No different away. Please see on installation tab.

Why this plugin doesn’t support link in carousel?

If you need link support in carousel. You have to purchase premium version from codecanyon here
